testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to delete the address information of the customer with the specified
testcase.name: The deletion of the address record should be verified through the API.
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/profile/addressDetails" path parameters............passed * The api user prepares a GET request containing the Deleted 175 to send to the api profile addressDetails endpoint..passed * The api user records the response returned from the api profile addressDetails endpoint and verifies that the status code is '404' and the reason phrase is Not Found..passed
